pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Physical Training
text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] for this skill test.
real_text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] for this skill test.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Dynamite Blast
text: Choose either your location or a connecting location. Deal 3 damage to each enemy and to each investigator at the chosen location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
real_text: Choose either your location or a connecting location. Deal 3 damage to each enemy and to each investigator at the chosen location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Hyperawareness
text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.
real_text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Barricade
text: Attach to your location. Non-[[Elite]] enemies cannot move into or spawn at attached location. Each time an enemy would spawn at attached location, spawn it at a connecting location instead, if able. Forced - When an investigator leaves attached location: Discard Barricade.
real_text: Attach to your location. Non-[[Elite]] enemies cannot move into or spawn at attached location. Each time an enemy would spawn at attached location, spawn it at a connecting location instead, if able. Forced - When an investigator leaves attached location: Discard Barricade.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Hard Knocks
text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.
real_text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Hot Streak
text: Gain 10 resources.
real_text: Gain 10 resources.
flavor: "I win again! Sorry sugar, it’s just not your night."

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Arcane Studies
text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test.
real_text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Mind Wipe
text:
Fast. Play after a phase begins.
Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy in your location. Until the end of the phase, reduce the chosen enemy's damage and horror values by 1, and treat its printed text box as if it were blank (except for [[Traits]]).
real_text:
Fast. Play after a phase begins.
Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy in your location. Until the end of the phase, reduce the chosen enemy's damage and horror values by 1, and treat its printed text box as if it were blank (except for [[Traits]]).

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Dig Deep
text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.
real_text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Rabbit's Foot
text: [reaction] After you fail a skill test, exhaust Rabbit's Foot: Search the top X cards of your deck for a card, draw it, and shuffle the remaining cards into your deck. X is the amount you failed by.
real_text: [reaction] After you fail a skill test, exhaust Rabbit's Foot: Search the top X cards of your deck for a card, draw it, and shuffle the remaining cards into your deck. X is the amount you failed by.
flavor: They claimed it would bring me good luck. I wouldn’t say that’s true. But now I feel like it would be even worse luck to get rid of it.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Return to The Gathering
text:
Perform the setup as indicated in the Night of the Zealot Campaign Guide, with the following exceptions:
- When gathering encounter sets, also gather the new encounter sets for Return to The Gathering shown here.
- Remove Act 1a- "Trapped" from the game and replace it with the new Act 1a- "Mysterious Gateway."
(Continued on reverse side.)
real_text:
Perform the setup as indicated in the Night of the Zealot Campaign Guide, with the following exceptions:
- When gathering encounter sets, also gather the new encounter sets for Return to The Gathering shown here.
- Remove Act 1a- "Trapped" from the game and replace it with the new Act 1a- "Mysterious Gateway."
(Continued on reverse side.)
back_text:
- Remove the original Study location from the game and replace it with the new Study (Aberrant Gateway). Put the Study (Aberrant Gateway) into play. Each investigator begins play in the Study (Aberrant Gateway).
- Put the new Guest Hall, Bedroom, and Bathroom locations into play.
- Remove the original Hallway location from the game.
- Choose one of the two Attic locations and one of the two Cellar locations at random, and set them aside, out of play. Remove the other versions of Attic and Cellar from the game.
- Set each other location aside, out of play.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Mysterious Gateway
text: Objective - Only investigators in the Guest Hall may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.
real_text: Objective - Only investigators in the Guest Hall may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.
flavor: As you leap to investigate, the door to your study vanishes before your eyes, leaving behind a strange gateway to another part of your house. There must be a reason why this is happening…
back_text:
Put into play the set-aside Hole in the Wall location.
Choose an investigator in the Guest Hall. The chosen investigator immediately moves into the Hole in the Wall and reveals it. Then, he or she must test [willpower] (4). For each point that investigator fails by, he or she must discard a random card from his or her hand.
back_flavor:
The layout of your home is vastly different from its usual structure. Somehow, your guest hall seems to have looped around on itself, and you are stuck with no way to enter the main hallway near the front of the house.
You notice that the wall between the guest bedroom and the bathroom is rotted and stained with what appears to be old blood. With no other way to proceed, you have no choice but to bust through the weak, rotted wall.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Study
text:
[action] [action]: Draw 3 cards. Only the lead investigator can activate this ability.
Forced - When an enemy attempts to spawn at a location that is not in play: Put that location into play and spawn that enemy there.
real_text:
[action] [action]: Draw 3 cards. Only the lead investigator can activate this ability.
Forced - When an enemy attempts to spawn at a location that is not in play: Put that location into play and spawn that enemy there.
flavor: The door to your study has vanished, leaving in its wake a gateway to another part of your house.
back_flavor: You’ve been investigating the strange events occurring in Arkham for several months now. Your desk is covered in newspaper articles, police reports, and witness accounts.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Guest Hall
text: Investigators in this location cannot take draw actions.
real_text: Investigators in this location cannot take draw actions.
flavor: How did you end up here… ?
back_flavor: Somehow you’ve ended up in a completely different part of your house.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Bedroom
text: Forced - After you fail a skill test while investigating the Bedroom: Discard 1 card at random from your hand.
real_text: Forced - After you fail a skill test while investigating the Bedroom: Discard 1 card at random from your hand.
flavor: The bedsheets are tattered, and a strange symbol is drawn on the fabric. Blood pools at the foot of the closet door, and you can hear something chewing inside.
back_flavor: A shadow dances across the floor beneath the bedroom door as you approach.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Bathroom
text: Forced - After you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [auto_fail] symbol while investigating the Bathroom: Lose all remaining actions and end your turn.
real_text: Forced - After you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [auto_fail] symbol while investigating the Bathroom: Lose all remaining actions and end your turn.
flavor: The guest bathroom looks as though it hasn't been cleaned in years. A viscous green liquid fills the bathtub in the far corner of the room, and mold has grown across the walls.
back_flavor: As you approach the bathroom door, the weight of the putrid, unnatural air causes you to gag.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Hallway
text: Forced - After you reveal this location: Put the set-aside Attic, Cellar, and Parlor locations into play.
real_text: Forced - After you reveal this location: Put the set-aside Attic, Cellar, and Parlor locations into play.
flavor: The walls of your house are splattered with mud, and your hardwood floor is gone, replaced with a dirt path.
back_flavor: I need this like I need a hole in my wall.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Attic
text: Forced - After you reveal the Attic: Put the set-aside Far Above Your House location into play.
real_text: Forced - After you reveal the Attic: Put the set-aside Far Above Your House location into play.
flavor: The bloody carcass of some sort of beast swings from a meat hook chained to the ceiling. Blood drains slowly from the carcass, dripping into a small barrel. To your surprise, a wooden ladder at the far end of the attic ascends through your roof, to an even higher area
back_flavor: The smell of rotten meat assaults your nostrils as you approach the attic stairs.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Field of Graves
text: Forced - After you reveal Field of Graves: Test [willpower] (4). For each point you fail by, discard 1 card at random from each player's hand.
real_text: Forced - After you reveal Field of Graves: Test [willpower] (4). For each point you fail by, discard 1 card at random from each player's hand.
flavor: You climb the ladder and emerge from a pit in the ground amidst an endless field of graves. Each bears a branch from your family tree.
back_flavor: You struggle to believe this is even possible, considering the attic is the highest point in your home. Or at least…was.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Cellar
text: Forced - After you reveal the Cellar: Put the set-aside Deep Below Your House location into play.
real_text: Forced - After you reveal the Cellar: Put the set-aside Deep Below Your House location into play.
flavor: Your cellar seems to have been replaced with an underground network of icy tunnels and caverns. The tunnels continue for miles, deeper and deeper beneath the surface.
back_flavor: The stairs leading down to your cellar are slick, and glisten with a thin layer of ice…

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Ghoul Pits
text: Forced - After you reveal Ghoul Pits: Test [agility] (3). For each point you fail by, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a copy of Swarm of Rats and draw it. Shuffle the encounter deck.
real_text: Forced - After you reveal Ghoul Pits: Test [agility] (3). For each point you fail by, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a copy of Swarm of Rats and draw it. Shuffle the encounter deck.
flavor: These pits seem to be the creatures' lairs. They are ice-cold and filled with the decaying remains of humans and other animals.
back_flavor: The tunnels extend for miles in every direction. Everywhere you look, strange canine creatures skitter on all fours in the distance, scrambling from one shadow to the next.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Corpse-Hungry Ghoul
text:
Spawn - Bedroom.
Hunter.
real_text:
Spawn - Bedroom.
Hunter.
flavor: Behind the door to your closet, the creature finishes its meal. Its appetite insatiable, it quickly turns its attention to you.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Ghoul from the Depths
text:
Spawn - Bathroom.
Retaliate.
real_text:
Spawn - Bathroom.
Retaliate.
flavor: Tearing its way out of the floor, a crazed beast emerges from the tunnels below. Its eyes are red with hunger and hate.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: The Zealot's Seal
text: Revelation - Each investigator with 3 or fewer cards in hand must take 1 damage and 1 horror. Each investigator with 4 or more cards in hand tests [willpower] (2). Each investigator who fails must discard 2 cards at random from his or her hand.
real_text: Revelation - Each investigator with 3 or fewer cards in hand must take 1 damage and 1 horror. Each investigator with 4 or more cards in hand tests [willpower] (2). Each investigator who fails must discard 2 cards at random from his or her hand.
flavor: The third seal will be the last.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Return to The Midnight Masks
text:
Perform the setup as indicated in the Night of the Zealot Campaign Guide, with the following exceptions:
- When gathering encounter sets, also gather the new encounter sets for Return to the Midnight Masks shown here.
- Construct the act deck using one of the two copies of Agenda 1a- "Predator or Prey" at random, without looking at their other sides. Remove the other version of Agenda 1a from the game.
(Continued on reverse side.)
real_text:
Perform the setup as indicated in the Night of the Zealot Campaign Guide, with the following exceptions:
- When gathering encounter sets, also gather the new encounter sets for Return to the Midnight Masks shown here.
- Construct the act deck using one of the two copies of Agenda 1a- "Predator or Prey" at random, without looking at their other sides. Remove the other version of Agenda 1a from the game.
(Continued on reverse side.)
back_text:
- Choose one of the two Easttown locations, one of the two Northside locations, one of the two Rivertown locations, and one of the two Miskatonic University locations at random. Put those locations into play. Remove the other versions of Easttown, Northside, Rivertown, and Miskatonic University from the game.
- When creating the "Cultist deck," include the 3 new Cult of Umôrdhoth cards included in this expansion. Shuffle the Cultist deck and remove 3 random cards from it, without looking at them. (You should be left with a 5-card Cultist deck.)
- If you are instructed to search the encounter deck for an Acolyte, search the encounter deck for any 1-health [[Cultist]] enemy, instead.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Predator or Prey?
text: [action]: Resign. You don't want to risk taking too long, so you head to safety with the information you've gathered.
real_text: [action]: Resign. You don't want to risk taking too long, so you head to safety with the information you've gathered.
flavor: Lita seems convinced of a conspiracy within the city of Arkham. She believes that a secret cult serves the ghouls that live in the crypts beneath the city, and that several of the cult’s prominent members are scattered throughout Arkham. As you begin searching for them, you can’t shake the feeling that you, too, are being hunted.

linked_card.pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
linked_card.name: Narôgath
linked_card.text:
Spawn - Engaged with Prey.
Prey - Nearest to another Cultist enemy.
Hunter.
Narôgath gets +3 health per investigator.
While Narôgath is ready, each investigator at its location or a connecting location cannot Parley with Cultist enemies.
linked_card.real_text:
Spawn - Engaged with Prey.
Prey - Nearest to another [[Cultist]] enemy.
Hunter.
Narôgath gets +3 health per investigator.
While Narôgath is ready, each investigator at its location or a connecting location cannot Parley with [[Cultist]] enemies.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Easttown
text: [action]: Add 2 supply tokens or ammo tokens to an asset you control. (Limit once per game.)
real_text: [action]: Add 2 supply tokens or ammo tokens to an asset you control. (Limit once per game.)
flavor: You doubt that Sheriff Engle will believe your story, but you might be able to convince some of the other officers to assist in your investigation.
back_flavor: The Easttown neighborhood, situated on the northern banks of the Miskatonic River, contains lower-class housing, the Arkham Police Station, and popular eateries like Velma’s Diner.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Northside
text: [action]: Move to any [[Arkham]] location. (Limit once per game.)
real_text: [action]: Move to any [[Arkham]] location. (Limit once per game.)
flavor: The train has many stops throughout Arkham, and many more beyond. You are tempted to leave all of this behind.
back_flavor: Northside is a commercial district that contains many offices and factories, as well as the train station.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Miskatonic University
text: [action] Take 2 horror: Gain 1 clue from the token pool. (Limit once per game.)
real_text: [action] Take 2 horror: Gain 1 clue from the token pool. (Limit once per game.)
flavor: The university's museum holds many peculiar exhibits and ominous relics from expeditions all over the world.
back_flavor: Miskatonic University is one of the most prestigious colleges in the Northeast. The university library is famous for its collection of occult books maintained by the esteemed Dr. Henry Armitage.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Rivertown
text: [action] Discard a card with X [willpower] icons: Remove X doom from a [[Cultist]] enemy in play. (Group limit once per game.)
real_text: [action] Discard a card with X [willpower] icons: Remove X doom from a [[Cultist]] enemy in play. (Group limit once per game.)
flavor: The lone warehouse next to the river is quiet and secluded: an ideal venue for unsavory dealings.
back_flavor: The banks of the Miskatonic River are lined with docks, warehouses and small shops in a district aptly named Rivertown.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Masked Horrors
text: Revelation - Each investigator with 2 or more clues takes 2 horror. If no horror is dealt by this effect, place 1 doom on the current agenda. This effect can cause the current agenda to advance.
real_text: Revelation - Each investigator with 2 or more clues takes 2 horror. If no horror is dealt by this effect, place 1 doom on the current agenda. This effect can cause the current agenda to advance.
flavor: "Umôrdhoth…Umôrdhoth…Umôrdhoth…"

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Return to The Devourer Below
text:
Perform the setup as indicated in the Night of the Zealot Campaign Guide, with the following exceptions:
- When gathering encounter sets, also gather the new encounter sets for Return to The Devourer Below shown here.
- When choosing 4 Arkham Woods locations to put into play at random, include the 4 new Arkham Woods locations included in this encounter set, for a total of 10 possibilities.
- After setting the Umôrdhoth enemy aside, flip this card over and attach it to Umôrdhoth.
real_text:
Perform the setup as indicated in the Night of the Zealot Campaign Guide, with the following exceptions:
- When gathering encounter sets, also gather the new encounter sets for Return to The Devourer Below shown here.
- When choosing 4 Arkham Woods locations to put into play at random, include the 4 new Arkham Woods locations included in this encounter set, for a total of 10 possibilities.
- After setting the Umôrdhoth enemy aside, flip this card over and attach it to Umôrdhoth.

linked_card.pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
linked_card.name: Vault of Earthly Demise
linked_card.text:
Vault of Earthly Demise cannot leave play.
Umôrdhoth gets +X health per investigator and gets +X fight, where X is the number of resources on this card.
Forced - When Umôrdhoth enters play, place 1 resource on this card for each act remaining in the act deck.
linked_card.real_text:
Vault of Earthly Demise cannot leave play.
Umôrdhoth gets +X health per investigator and gets +X fight, where X is the number of resources on this card.
Forced - When Umôrdhoth enters play, place 1 resource on this card for each act remaining in the act deck.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Arkham Woods
text: Forced - After an investigator at this location succeeds at a skill test on a treachery: That treachery gains surge. (Group limit once per round.)
real_text: Forced - After an investigator at this location succeeds at a skill test on a treachery: That treachery gains surge. (Group limit once per round.)
flavor: It seems to groan and twist in the chill wind, as though alive.
back_flavor: Growing up, you were always warned to stay out of the woods at night. Now you know why.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Arkham Woods
text: Forced - After you reveal a chaos token from the chaos bag while investigating this location: Reveal and resolve an additional chaos token. (Limit once per test.)
real_text: Forced - After you reveal a chaos token from the chaos bag while investigating this location: Reveal and resolve an additional chaos token. (Limit once per test.)
flavor: This used to be a popular spot for fishing, but it doesn't look like anybody has fished here in years.
back_flavor: Growing up, you were always warned to stay out of the woods at night. Now you know why.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Arkham Woods
text: Each enemy at this location cannot take more than 1 damage from each attack performed against it.
real_text: Each enemy at this location cannot take more than 1 damage from each attack performed against it.
flavor: The remains of half-eaten animal corpses litter this section of the woods, befouling the air with their stench.
back_flavor: Growing up, you were always warned to stay out of the woods at night. Now you know why.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Arkham Woods
text: Forced - After you reveal a chaos token from the chaos bag during an evasion attempt at this location: Reveal and resolve an additional chaos token. (Limit once per test.)
real_text: Forced - After you reveal a chaos token from the chaos bag during an evasion attempt at this location: Reveal and resolve an additional chaos token. (Limit once per test.)
flavor: Not even on a dare would you attempt to cross this rotted, rickety bridge.
back_flavor: Growing up, you were always warned to stay out of the woods at night. Now you know why.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Umôrdhoth's Hunger
text: Revelation - Each investigator must discard 1 card at random from his or her hand. Each investigator who has no cards in his or her hand is killed. Heal 1 damage from each enemy in play.
real_text: Revelation - Each investigator must discard 1 card at random from his or her hand. Each investigator who has no cards in his or her hand is killed. Heal 1 damage from each enemy in play.
flavor: It prefers to feast on the rot of the deceased, but when the hunger is overpowering, the living will suffice.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Grave-Eater
text: Forced - After Grave-Eater attacks you: Discard 1 card at random from your hand.
real_text: Forced - After Grave-Eater attacks you: Discard 1 card at random from your hand.
flavor:
Its position was a kind of crouch, and as one looked one felt that at any moment it might drop its present prey and seek a juicier morsel.
-H. P. Lovecraft, “Pickman’s Model”

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Acolyte of Umôrdhoth
text:
Prey - Fewest cards in hand.
While engaged with an investigator with no cards in his or her hand, Acolyte of Umôrdhoth cannot be evaded.
real_text:
Prey - Fewest cards in hand.
While engaged with an investigator with no cards in his or her hand, Acolyte of Umôrdhoth cannot be evaded.
flavor: Its dreadful mask conceals the true horror beneath.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Chill from Below
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). For each point you fail by, you must discard 1 card at random from your hand. For each card you cannot discard, take 1 damage.
real_text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). For each point you fail by, you must discard 1 card at random from your hand. For each card you cannot discard, take 1 damage.
flavor: The ground is covered in ice and frost, and a deep chill courses through the air.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Disciple of the Devourer
text:
Spawn - Farthest empty location.
Forced - After you spawn Disciple of the Devourer: You must either place 1 doom on it or place 1 of your clues on its location. If the current agenda is not agenda 1, do both instead.
real_text:
Spawn - Farthest empty location.
Forced - After you spawn Disciple of the Devourer: You must either place 1 doom on it or place 1 of your clues on its location. If the current agenda is not agenda 1, do both instead.
flavor: Placate the beast, and we are allowed to live. When we die, it will feast on our remains.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Corpse-Taker
text:
Spawn - Farthest empty location.
Forced - At the end of the mythos phase: Place 1 doom on Corpse-Taker.
Forced - At the end of the enemy phase: Corpse-Taker moves once toward Rivertown or Main Path. If Corpse-Taker is already at Rivertown or Main Path, move all doom from Corpse-Taker to the current agenda, instead.
real_text:
Spawn - Farthest empty location.
Forced - At the end of the mythos phase: Place 1 doom on Corpse-Taker.
Forced - At the end of the enemy phase: Corpse-Taker moves once toward Rivertown or Main Path. If Corpse-Taker is already at Rivertown or Main Path, move all doom from Corpse-Taker to the current agenda, instead.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Mask of Umôrdhoth
text:
Revelation - Attach to the farthest [[Cultist]] enemy and place 1 doom on that enemy. If there are no [[Cultist]] enemies in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Cultist]] enemy, draw it, and attach Mask of Umôrdhoth to it. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Attached enemy gets +2 health. If attached enemy is unique, it gains retaliate. If it is non-unique, it gains aloof instead.
real_text:
Revelation - Attach to the farthest [[Cultist]] enemy and place 1 doom on that enemy. If there are no [[Cultist]] enemies in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Cultist]] enemy, draw it, and attach Mask of Umôrdhoth to it. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Attached enemy gets +2 health. If attached enemy is unique, it gains retaliate. If it is non-unique, it gains aloof instead.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Jeremiah Pierce
text:
Spawn - Your House. Otherwise, Rivertown.
[action]: Parley. Add Jeremiah Pierce to the victory display. Then, test [willpower] (4). Place 1 doom on the current agenda for each point you fail by (this can cause the current agenda to advance).
real_text:
Spawn - Your House. Otherwise, Rivertown.
[action]: Parley. Add Jeremiah Pierce to the victory display. Then, test [willpower] (4). Place 1 doom on the current agenda for each point you fail by (this can cause the current agenda to advance).
flavor: He seems a little too interested in what you’ve been up to these days.

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Billy Cooper
text:
Spawn - Easttown.
Forced - After a [[Monster]] enemy is defeated at Billy Cooper's location: Add Billy Cooper to the victory display.
real_text:
Spawn - Easttown.
Forced - After a [[Monster]] enemy is defeated at Billy Cooper's location: Add Billy Cooper to the victory display.
flavor: The cops have been writing off these disappearances as animal attacks. One cop, in particular…

pack_name: Return to the Night of the Zealot
name: Alma Hill
text:
Spawn - Southside.
[action]: Parley. Draw the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Then, add Alma Hill to the victory display.
real_text:
Spawn - Southside.
[action]: Parley. Draw the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Then, add Alma Hill to the victory display.
flavor: Miss Hill has been preventing other members of the Historical Society from researching similar disappearances. What is she afraid of?
